lead_paragraph: A judge ruled that New York City’s water board exceeded its authority in authorizing a one-time credit and general rate increase.

headline.print_headline: Court Halts de Blasio’s $183 Credit on Water Bills
headline.main: Court Halts de Blasio’s Plan to Give Some Homeowners a $183 Credit

snippet: A judge ruled that New York City’s water board exceeded its authority in authorizing a one-time credit and general rate increase.
abstract: New York State Supreme Court Justice Carol R Edmead rules that New York City's plan to give owners of one- to three-family homes $183 credit on their water and sewer bill would exceed authority of city's water board; ruling deals blow to de Blasio administration, which has vowed to appeal.
